item.description:
Next meetup will be Tuesday, March 20th at 7 PM.  Hope many of you can make the meeting.

I will happily set up appointments for anyone interested in trying the LaserTouchOne or the LifeWave pain, detox and inflammation patches before or after the meeting.  Just let me know ahead of time.

The weather back there has been incredible.  Hope it has made the pain of most winters mor bearable.

Come with your questions, solutions and cares and concerns and we will have a good time sharing our issues.

Small donations are always welcome to defray my costs.

See you in a month!

 

BETSY
item.how_to_find_us: At the Senior Center Lounge on Pleasant Street Reading upstairs, elevator to the right through the glass door once you go in the front door
item.name: Time for our meetup
